Green-cheeked Conure

Conures [object Object]

A small, popular conure known for its relatively quiet nature. They are mostly green with a maroon tail, grey head, and subtle red on the belly.

Datos R치pidos

Tama침o

10 inches (25.5 cm). Weight: 60-80g (2.1-2.8 oz)

Peso Promedio

70 g

Nivel de Ruido

Quiet to Moderate. By far one of the quietest conure species, making them excellent for apartment living.

Origen

Central & South America

Temperamento y Personalidad

Goofy, affectionate, and intelligent. They are less prone to being nippy than other conures and have big personalities in small bodies.

Vocalizaci칩n y Capacidad de Habla

Can learn some words, but their voices are gravelly and not very clear. They often learn to mimic household sounds.

Dieta y Alimentaci칩n

A standard conure diet of pellets, fresh vegetables, and some fruit. Ensure a varied diet to keep them engaged.

Salud y Longevidad

Generally robust and can live 15-25 years with proper care. Can be prone to polyomavirus. They love to snuggle in fabric, so be cautious about cloth huts that can cause crop impaction or strangulation.

Alojamiento

Perfect for apartments. They are relatively quiet and their smaller size means a cage of 20"W x 20"D x 24"H is a good minimum size, though larger is always better.
